title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Instructional Design Capabilities for School-Based Design and Maker Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and experience in language education
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can plan and implement language education design projects by applying a reflective design process.
Learners can collaboratively design maker education activities with peer educators using a cooperative teaching model.
Learners can explain how to utilize digital fabrication tools (3D printers, laser cutters, etc.) in language learning content development.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
